resources.string: Catedral del Ártico: Este impresionante edificio de arquitectura moderna es uno de los principales atractivos de Tromsø. La Catedral del Ártico, construida en 1965, cuenta con un diseño único y una gran vidriera que permite la entrada de luz natural, creando un ambiente sereno y tranquilo en su interior.
Northern Lights Viewing: Tromsø is famous for being one of the best places in the world to witness the breathtaking Northern Lights. During clear and cloudless nights.

Fjellheisen Perspective: You can visit the Fjellheisen Perspective, it is located on the top of a mountain on the other side of the fjord from the Tromsø cable car. From here, you will have a stunning view of the entire city and the surrounding area.

The Tromsø Ice Domes (also known as the Tromsø Ice Hotel) are a tourist attraction located in Tromsø, a city in northern Norway, above the Arctic Circle. It is a hotel and complex built entirely of ice and snow, which is reconstructed every winter.

Walter and Leonard, tucked into a historical corner of the building, we aim to deliver an intimate dining experience that seamlessly combines Norwegian food traditions with the latest culinary trends.

At Restaurant Smak located in Tromsø, guests can enjoy delightful culinary creations made from locally sourced ingredients. The menu showcases the unique and diverse natural elements of Northern Norway and consists of the finest seasonal ingredients sourced from the region.
